content: meet this magical wizard this is the second of a monthly frog series i am doing where i will be releasing a new frog every month with a new hat and maybe an accessory every now and then requirements 3 25mm hook worst weight yarn in multi colours ¼ dowel 14 long this may differ for your project scissors and needle you can use whichever hook/yarn/stitch combination you would like the pattern includes instructions for my personal preference and what i believe to be a good start for beginners when i started i was inspired by a pixel image of a frog from pinterest these are going to be free because of this i have edited the original pixel pattern to be tapestry crocheted and each new hat is of my own design
